articles.title: 'The future is fungal': New research finds that fungi that live in healthy plants are sensitive to climate change - Phys.org
articles.description: Spruce, pine, fir and other trees tower across the frigid swaths of land that span North America, northern Europe and Russia in a great ring around the world. These boreal forests constitute the largest land ecosystem and the northernmost forests on Earth.

articles.title: NASCAR Power Rankings: William Byron surges with Daytona 500 win - FOX Sports
articles.description: William Byron's Daytona 500 victory shook up this week's rankings. See where your favorite driver landed after the "Great American Race."
articles.content:
While Daytona isn't too telling on how a driver will do during the season, William Byron certainly deserves to move to the top spot in these power rankings.
